name: JMF Framework Website

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# JMF Framework Website Installation Script

cd /mnt/server

# Create entrypoint.sh if it doesn't exist
if [ ! -f entrypoint.sh ]; then
    curl -sSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/nanaimo2013/jmf-framework-website/main/entrypoint.sh -o entrypoint.sh
    chmod +x entrypoint.sh
fi

echo "Installation completed successfully!"
